page.title: 03Building
page.content: The rocks of the area are Old Red Sandstone which makes execellent building stone.In the olden days all houses and farm buildings were built of this stone.There are two disused quarries in the area where stone was excavated for building purposes.The best stone would have been brought in from quarries in other parishes.Not only were the walls built of stone but also the roofs were made of thick flagstones and the floors.After the 2nd.World War many houses were built out of old army huts and concrete blocks were built around them.Many of these are still in use today.Houses nowadays are built of blocks with tiled roofs.Farm buildings today are generally built of steel.
